casebody.data:
Second Department,

March, 1959

(March 23, 1959) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Myron E. Wilson, Appellant.

Motion to enlarge time granted; appellant to perfect the appeal for the September Term, beginning Wednesday, September 9, 1959, for which term the appeal is ordered to be placed on the calendar. Motion for leave to appeal as a poor person denied. Present — Nolan, P. J., Wenzel, Ughetta, Hallinan and Kleinfeld, JJ.
